CustomField.formula: IF ( Annual_Base_Income__c > 0 , "Base: $" + Text(Annual_Base_Income__c) , "" ) + IF ( Annual_Commission_Bonus_Income__c > 0 , " + Bonus & Commission: $" + Text(Annual_Commission_Bonus_Income__c ) , "" ) + IF ( Annual_Overtime_Inome__c > 0 , " + Overtime: $" + Text(Annual_Overtime_Inome__c ) , "" ) + IF(ISPICKVAL( Provide_a_Company_Car__c ,"Yes"), " + Company Car", "" ) + IF ( Last_year_net_profit__c > 0 , " + Last Yr Net Profit: $" + Text(Last_year_net_profit__c ) , "" ) + IF ( Previous_year_net_profit__c > 0 , " + Prev Yr Net Profit: $" + Text(Previous_year_net_profit__c ) , "" ) + IF ( Annual_salary_before_tax__c > 0 , " + Salary from Business: $" + Text(Annual_salary_before_tax__c ) , "" )
CustomField.label: Income Description Field
